verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6965"\w* David \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Nob, \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Ahimelech \w the|strong="H6965"\w* priest. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H6965"\w* Ahimelech met David, \w he|strong="H5892"\w* trembled \w and|strong="H6965"\w* asked \w him|strong="H3083"\w*, “Why \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w* alone? Why \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w no|strong="H6965"\w* \w one|strong="H5892"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w*?”

“\w The|strong="H1732"\w* king \w has|strong="H3548"\w* given me \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mission,” \w David|strong="H1732"\w* replied. “\w He|strong="H1732"\w* told me no one \w is|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H1732"\w* know \w about|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* mission or charge. \w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w I|strong="H7122"\w* \w have|strong="H3548"\w* directed \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w young|strong="H1732"\w* men \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w meet|strong="H7122"\w* me \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* certain place.

\w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w then|strong="H7971"\w*, \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w do|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* hand? \w Give|strong="H6680"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* five loaves \w of|strong="H4428"\w* bread, \w or|strong="H4428"\w* whatever \w can|strong="H3045"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w found|strong="H3045"\w*.”

“\w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H4672"\w* common \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*,” \w the|strong="H5414"\w* priest replied, “\w but|strong="H6258"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w some|strong="H3027"\w* consecrated \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*—\w provided|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w young|strong="H4672"\w* men \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w kept|strong="H5414"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* women.”

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “Women \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w been|strong="H3426"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* usual \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w set|strong="H6944"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w*. \w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* equipment \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w common|strong="H2455"\w* missions, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w all|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* time.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w gave|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w* bread, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H6113"\w* bread \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Bread \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Presence, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w removed|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H8032"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* replaced \w with|strong="H3318"\w* hot bread \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Saul’s \w servants|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, detained \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* name \w was|strong="H3068"\w* Doeg \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Edomite, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w chief|strong="H3548"\w* shepherd \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Saul. David Flees to Gath (Psalms 34:1–22; Psalms 56:1–13)

\w Then|strong="H7586"\w* \w David|strong="H3117"\w* asked Ahimelech, “\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w not|strong="H6113"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spear \w or|strong="H3117"\w* sword \w on|strong="H3117"\w* hand \w here|strong="H8033"\w*? \w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* neither \w my|strong="H3068"\w* sword \w nor|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* weapons \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w*’s business \w was|strong="H3068"\w* urgent.”

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* priest replied, “\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Goliath \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Philistine, \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w killed|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Valley \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Elah, \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*; \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* wrapped \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cloth behind \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ephod. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w want|strong="H3808"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w other|strong="H6311"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w*.” \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*; \w give|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*.”

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* day \w David|strong="H1732"\w* fled \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w Saul|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Achish king \w of|strong="H6010"\w* Gath.

\w But|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Achish said \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w Is|strong="H1931"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*? \w Did|strong="H1732"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* sing \w about|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* dances, saying: ‘\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* slain \w his|strong="H1732"\w* thousands, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* tens \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thousands’?”

\w Now|strong="H2088"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H4428"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* words \w to|strong="H4428"\w* heart \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w very|strong="H2088"\w* much afraid \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Achish \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Gath.

\w So|strong="H3966"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* changed \w his|strong="H7760"\w* behavior \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* feigned madness \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* hands; \w he|strong="H1732"\w* scratched \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* doors \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* gate \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* saliva run \w down|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* beard.

\w Then|strong="H3381"\w* Achish said \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* servants, “\w Look|strong="H5869"\w*, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w can|strong="H5869"\w* \w see|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H8179"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* insane! \w Why|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*?

Am \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* need \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w madmen|strong="H7696"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w brought|strong="H5650"\w* \w this|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7696"\w* \w to|strong="H5650"\w* rave \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* presence? Must \w this|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7696"\w* come \w into|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* house?”
